name: Retro Block Breaker (Jargonloster)
description:
A breakout-style game made as part of the Unity 2D course by GameDev.tv.

  • Move mouse to control paddle
  • Press 'R' to reset level (in case you get stuck in an endless loop)
  • There's 10 levels, infinite attempts for each level, but you lose points each time you die (unless your score would go below zero)

Post your score in the comments if you beat all 10 levels! (My high score is 3060)
